image.title: Upload your image:
image.upload: Your device does not support file uploading.
image.drag: Drag an image or click here to select a image
image.tap: Tap here to select a image from your gallery
image.fileSize: The file size exceeds the limit
image.fileType: Only JPEG and PNG are supported!

file.title: Upload your file:
file.upload: Your device does not support file uploading.
file.drag: Drag an file or click here to select a file
file.tap: Tap here to select a file from your device
file.fileSize: The file size exceeds the limit
file.fileType: Only PDF, DOC(X), XLS(X) and PPT(X) are supported!
